TopicTitle: Does this game have a malicious AI out to get us? :)

Articles.Content:
I sent a mining ship to Pol.  I knew I was launching without enough fuel and intended to stair-step my way there.  Fill up at Minmus, fine.  Fill up at Ike, fine.  Oops, I was a bit too low on the fuel, it wasn't going to make it to Pol.  It's manned, I have to go rescue it.  Ok, big tanker heading out.  Top off from the mining craft at Minmus and head on out.  I capture and look around for the stranded mining ship to rendezvous with.  It's nowhere to be found.  Tracking station--it's near the orbit of Dres, falling in with a periapsis dangerously close to Kerbol.  There must have been an ejection encounter.  I burned it's remaining fuel to get a safe orbit, it's going to be a pain to chase down and refuel.

Also, MechJeb does not understand claw-based "docking".
Ike and Tylo are known to be neighborhood bullies. Best to steer clear of them.

This is more the result of a mission than a gameplay question. And so, moved. 

Good luck with it.
IIRC, there is the kraken... Not really AI though

4 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

This is more the result of a mission than a gameplay question. And so, moved. 

Good luck with it.  

Didn't notice there even was a Mission Reports forum.

It just felt like everything decided to go wrong.  Not to mention somehow getting the Jool encounter backwards and getting a retrograde orbit.
